subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Syndergaard struck out six in seven and a third inning and was 3 for 3, including a home run, and Lucas Duda homered twice for the Mets on Wednesday afternoon.
snippet: Syndergaard struck out six in seven and a third inning and was 3 for 3, including a home run, and Lucas Duda homered twice for the Mets on Wednesday afternoon.
